verbs.description: ireland scraps religious selection in catholic primary school admissionsireland scraps religious selection in catholic primary school admissions this [V: may] not be a big deal for people across the pond but this is massive for people in the uk dealing with issues concerning secularism and school admissions this sort of policy has blighted the uk education system for time immemorial and to see this volte - face in ireland is well pretty staggering it appears england ireland humanists director primary school richy thompson richard bruton school public affairs uk government at richy humanism org uk humanists uk uk
